Chapter.Label: The Small Algebra Package
Chapter.Heading: Small BarInverseMonoid Package
Chapter.Section:
Accessing Small BarInverseMonoid AllSmallBarInverseMonoid is an accessor function for accessing the complete list of non-isomorphic barinversemonoid models from orders 2 to 7.
The models are generated by Mace4 , using the definitions in Section .

Definition of BarInverseMonoid formulas(BarInverseMonoid).
x*(y*z) = (x*y)*z.
1*x = x.
x*1=x.
a(u*v) = a(v)*a(u).
a(a(u)) = u.
(u*a(u))*u = u.
(u*a(u))*(v*a(v)) = (v*a(v))*(u*a(u)).
f(1)=0.
f(0)=1.
u*f(v) = f(u*v)*u.
end_of_list.
Dependency This package has no dependencies .
